name: You Have One Job: Keep It Alive
name_original: You Have One Job: Keep It Alive
description:
"You Have One Job: Keep It Alive is a game where you must keep a mysterious creature alive by clicking on buttons. It's easy, at first. Don't panic, if you fail, he's gonna be happy in Weird-Worms-Paradise. At least, that's what we say to scientists."

I made the game completely by myself for Ludum Dare 46, using Construct3 and a few sounds from freesound.org. Everything else is made by me, music, code and graphics include.
Thank you for the reading, and above all for trying my game.
